code: import React from'react';import OpportunityCard from'../cards/opportunity/OpportunityCard.jsx';import CardsCarousel from'../cards/carousel/CardsCarousel.jsx';import OrganizationCard from'../cards/organization/OrganizationCard.jsx';import PersonCard from'../cards/person/PersonCard.jsx';import NoResultsCard from'../cards/noResults/NoResultsCard.jsx';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function getCard(result,index){switch(result["type"]){case"opportunity":return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OpportunityCard,{opportunity:result["result"]},index);case"people":if(result["result"].length>0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardsCarousel,{type:"people",children:result["result"].map(function(person){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PersonCard,{picture:person.picture,name:person.name},person.id+index);})},index);}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(React.Fragment,{},index);}case"organization":if(result["result"].length>0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardsCarousel,{type:"organization",children:result["result"].map(function(organization){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OrganizationCard,{id:organization.id+index,picture:organization.picture,name:organization.name,members:organization.members},organization.id+index);})},index);}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NoResultsCard,{},index);}default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NoResultsCard,{},index);}}
